entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 18.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning late this evening. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 18. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
